p: In our study we have used drops of pure essential oils on bean masses and although such technique showed good biological activities on C. maculatus under laboratory conditions and may have potential applications at small farmerâ€™s level, this delivery system may suffer from draw backs inherent to the volatile nature of essential oils in larger storage facilities. In fact, rapid biodegradation of these compounds due to their poor physicochemical stability, high volatility, and thermal decomposition will require some controlled-release system such as nanotechnological formulations to optimize the action of their active ingredients [ 75, 76].
